about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: I'm a full-stack developer and network administrator, building dynamic applications with Laravel, React.js, and MySQL while managing reliable system and network infrastructures. Versatile and detail-oriented, I combine web development, hardware diagnostics, and cybersecurity practices to deliver scalable and secure solutions. Open to international collaboration, I'm currently pursuing SQL and cybersecurity certifications to elevate my technical profile.

skill.title: My Skills
skill.description: Every skill I've developed goes beyond theory, it's tested and proven in real-world situations. I work with these tools and languages daily, applying professional standards to deliver solid and optimized results. My portfolio projects are a direct reflection of this expertise, built with passion, precision, and attention to detail.

experience.intro: With a strong background in web development, I specialize in using
experience.stack: Laravel and React to build elegant, high-performance interfaces.
experience.practice: I follow best practices to create
experience.scope: My experience spans a variety of projects, from showcase websites to
experience.focus: complex front-end systems, with a constant focus on clean code and exceptional user experience.

experienceTopLeft.description: Web developer with 2 years of experience, I use Laravel and React to build reliable and high-performance interfaces.

frontend.resp1: Designed and developed dynamic user interfaces using React.js.
frontend.resp2: Built reusable and modular components to streamline development.
frontend.resp3: Developed a custom management system for dental practice operations using Laravel, MySQL, and React.
frontend.resp4: Tested, debugged and maintained code stability in production.

backend.resp1: Developed secure RESTful APIs with Laravel to support core dental operations.
backend.resp2: Designed and optimized MySQL databases for patient records, appointments, and billing.
backend.resp3: Integrated backend services with React frontend to ensure seamless data flow.
backend.resp4: Implemented user authentication and access control for data privacy.

network.resp1: Set up routers, firewalls, and VPNs to ensure data privacy and reliable connectivity.
network.resp2: Monitored network performance and resolved hardware or connectivity issues.
network.resp3: Managed server deployments and system updates to support web-based platforms.
network.resp4: Diagnosed and repaired hardware components to ensure uptime and continuity.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Throughout my journey in web development, I’ve contributed to a range of projects — from responsive websites for small businesses to advanced full-stack applications and complex front-end interfaces. I’ve designed custom, high-performance, and scalable solutions while adhering to modern development standards.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.message1: Let’s collaborate to bring your ideas to life.
contact.message2: Just a few clicks can turn inspiration into action.
